poster: E AA Q R and die
title: 20+ professionals, 200+ collective years of design experience
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oFERPp8iG78&feature=emb_title

For those of you who are wondering what this is all about, Wukong update ended up being horrible, and Wukong mains are trying to reach out Riot designers and Lutzburg to get back to the first rework that was created by Meddler.

The Rework damage is so low, to the point even a challenger's opinion is not taken into consideration, rather, the opinion of the professionals with their 200+ years of experience is far more important and flawless.

Check out reddit for more information about this amazing rework progress:
https://www.reddit.com/r/Wukongmains/
